name: UltraViolet - NYU
description: UltraViolet is a repository built on InvenioRDM for NYU Libraries collections, including proprietary data collections. It allows depositing materials and uses the DataCite metadata schema. Metadata is open to enhance discovery and allow repurposing.
owner_name: New York University Division of Libraries, UltraViolet service team
tags: Academic repository, Data repositories, Scholarly communications
